architecture.heading: MACH architecture
architecture.subHeading: MACH technologies accomplish digital transformation, supporting composable businesses to remain agile, nimble, customer-centric, and future-proof.

contents.title: Microservice-base
contents.des: Connect loosely coupled, independently deployable small components or "services" to compose a single, more complex application. Using microservices, these applications deliver faster responses, are more reliable, and can be deployed more frequently.

contents.title: API-first
contents.des: All functionality is exposed through an API, making it possible to tie together two or more applications or services, and retrieve the exact data they want from any source. High API extensibility allows businesses to add functionality and tailor how an API behaves to exact needs.

contents.title: Cloud-native SaaS
contents.des: Software-as-a-Service leverages full capability of cloud to achieve faster development, better scalability and flexibility with cloud-native applications. Free from maintaining servers and on-premise software lock-in.

contents.title: Headless
contents.des: Separate backend processes from front-end UX to build the seamless, cutting-edge shopping experiences. Update either the content presentation layer or business functional (commerce) layer without impacting the other and waiting weeks to activate a feature or respond to change.
